Module com.example.escritura_rapida
Package com.example.escritura_rapida.view

Class StatisticsView

java.lang.Object
com.example.escritura_rapida.view.StatisticsView
public class StatisticsView extends Object
Represents the view layer of the statistics screen in the Fast Typing application.

The StatisticsView class groups together all UI components from the statistics screen, such as labels for successful words, remaining time, final score, and the close button. It provides accessors for these components so that controllers can display results and manage interactions.

This class follows the MVC pattern by keeping statistics-related UI elements in the view package, separated from logic in controllers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ignacio Henao Henao
